articles.title: Umbrella Academy's Elliot Page opens up about coming out as transgender - digitalspy.com
articles.description: "I felt like a boy. I wanted to be a boy."
articles.content:
The Umbrella Academy's Elliot Page has opened up about his decision to come out as transgender, revealing that he now feels "true excitement and deep gratitude" about becoming his authentic self.
